results.name: Numbers k such that 2^k does not contain the digit 4 (probably finite).
program: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..1000] | not 4 in Intseq(2^n) ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 07 2015
xref: Cf. similar sequences listed in A035064.
results.author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1998
